title: Tamiryn Ulaan Khoshuu
description: Burial site located near the northern bank of the Tamir River in Mongolia. The site contains nearly 300 burials dated to the Xiongnu period (ca. 3rd century BCE-1st century CE).

properties.description: Point representing the visible remains at the Tamiryn Ulaan Khoshuu burial site, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node after TÈ¯rbat 2021.
